mapper.insert: INSERT INTO react_use.case_petitions ( id, PlatformId, CaseId, Status, productName, ProductId, TraderName, TraderMail, TraderUrl, BoughtDate, Price, petitionTypeValue, petitionTypeOther, petitionContext, ExpectResloveTypeValue, ExpectResloveTypeOther, Other, Other01, Other02, Other03, Other04, Other05, DeleteFlag, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedBy, IsTemp )VALUES( #{uuId}, NULL, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{loginUser}, NULL )

INSERT INTO react_use.case_relations ( id, CaseId, CasePetition, PlatformId, PetitionUserId, PetitionUserInfo_Email, Agent1_Email, Agent2_Email, Agent3_Email, Agent4_Email, Agent5_Email, TraderUserEmail, TraderAgent1_UserEmail, TraderAgent2_UserEmail, TraderAgent3_UserEmail, TraderAgent4_UserEmail, TraderAgent5_UserEmail, MediatorUserEmail, ArbitrationUserEmail, Other01, Other02, Other03, Other04, Other05, DeleteFlag, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedBy )VALUES( #{uuId}, NULL, #{uuId}, NULL, #{userId}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{loginUser} )
